scripts.compileAll: yarn run compileBaseSass && yarn run compileBS && yarn run compileCaDi && yarn run compileGoL && yarn run compileLiRo && yarn run compileMW && yarn run compilePeSo && yarn run compileSabo && yarn run compileSnake && yarn run compileTTT
scripts.compileBS: tsc -p tsconfig/bs.json && node-sass --output-style compressed sass/bs.sass public/bs/style.css
scripts.compileCaDi: tsc -p tsconfig/cadi.json && node-sass --output-style compressed sass/cadi.sass public/cadi/style.css
scripts.compileGoL: tsc -p tsconfig/gol.json && node-sass --output-style compressed sass/gol.sass public/gol/style.css
scripts.compileLiRo: tsc -p tsconfig/liro.json && node-sass --output-style compressed sass/liro.sass public/liro/style.css
scripts.compileMW: tsc -p tsconfig/mw.json && node-sass --output-style compressed sass/mw.sass public/mw/style.css
scripts.compilePeSo: tsc -p tsconfig/peso.json && node-sass --output-style compressed sass/peso.sass public/peso/style.css
scripts.compileSabo: tsc -p tsconfig/sabo.json && node-sass --output-style compressed sass/sabo.sass public/sabo/style.css
scripts.compileSnake: tsc -p tsconfig/snake.json && node-sass --output-style compressed sass/snake.sass public/snake/style.css
scripts.compileTTT: tsc -p tsconfig/ttt.json && node-sass --output-style compressed sass/ttt.sass public/ttt/style.css
